title: Nannie Annie
description: Delia and Rose are two children housebound by illness. They long to play outside with other children. Then one day, a mysterious nanny appears on their doorstep during a snowstorm. With her sidekick, a little unicorn called Luna, Nannie Annie helps the girls heal.Join them on a magical voyage to The Land of the Unicorns, and a trip to the moon (and back).Nannie Annie is the debut work of liver transplant survivor Alice Starzl. Cover art also by Alice Starzl.
author: Alice Starzl
